children.text: Quick Start Guide
Click on an item to start typing (Edit Mode).
Press `Esc` to stop editing and enter Navigation (View) Mode.
Press `Enter` in Edit Mode to split an item or create a new one.
Press `Shift+Enter` to create a new line within an item.
Key Features
Modes: Separate View and Edit modes for streamlined navigation without accidental typing.
Zoom In: Click a bullet point to focus on that item and its children.
Zoom Out: Use the breadcrumbs at the top or press `Ctrl+Up` to go back.
Expand/Collapse: Click the triangle next to an item to show or hide its children.
Daily Log: Press `Ctrl+J` to jump directly to a special section for today's date.
Quick Find: Press `Ctrl+Shift+K` to open the search bar.
All Hotkeys
Edit Mode
Esc : Switch to View Mode
Enter : Create a new item or split the current one
Shift+Enter : Add a new line within the current item
Tab : Indent current item
Shift+Tab : Outdent current item
Ctrl+L : Turn selected text into a link
[[ : Start typing to link to another item
Arrow Keys : Move text cursor only
View Mode (Navigation)
Enter : Switch to Edit Mode
Up/Down Arrow : Navigate between items
Left Arrow : Go to parent (if collapsed) OR Fold (if expanded)
Right Arrow : Go to child (if expanded) OR Unfold (if collapsed)
Ctrl+Left : Recursively Fold
Ctrl+Right : Recursively Unfold
Backspace : Delete item and all sub-items
Ctrl+Down (or Zoom Icon) : Zoom In
Ctrl+Up : Zoom Out
Organizing (Both Modes)
Alt+Up Arrow : Move item up
Alt+Down Arrow : Move item down
Changelog
Version 0.1.37: Direct Linking
Clicking an internal link (e.g., [[Page Name]]) now navigates directly to that item if it exists, instead of opening the search window.
Version 0.1.36: Enhanced Navigation
Navigating to a specific item (via Quick Find, Daily Log, or Sidebar) now automatically unfolds that item and zooms into its parent for better context.
Version 0.1.35: Text Editor Improvements
In Edit Mode, Up/Down arrow keys now move the cursor within the text (standard editor behavior) instead of navigating to adjacent bullets.
Version 0.1.34: Bug Fix
Fixed a runtime error where the tag popup logic was referencing an undefined variable in the standalone build.
Version 0.1.33: Improved Navigation
Left Arrow in View Mode now collapses the item if expanded, or selects the parent if collapsed/empty.
Right Arrow in View Mode now expands the item if collapsed, or selects the first child if expanded.
Ctrl+Left/Right Arrow triggers recursive folding/unfolding of the selected item.
Version 0.1.32: UI & Navigation Refinement
Fixed View Mode arrow key navigation reliability.
Updated bullet text color to match the sidebar for better visual consistency.
Version 0.1.31: Enhanced View Mode Controls
Backspace in View Mode now deletes the selected item and all its sub-items.
Decoupled Arrow keys from collapsing: Left Arrow always goes to parent, Right Arrow goes to child (if expanded).
Reinstated Ctrl+Left (Recursive Fold) and Ctrl+Right (Recursive Unfold).
Version 0.1.30: View Mode Navigation Updates
Backspace in View Mode now deletes the selected item and all its sub-items.
Arrow keys in View Mode no longer toggle collapse state; they strictly navigate.
Added Ctrl+Left to recursively fold and Ctrl+Right to recursively unfold items.
Version 0.1.29: Fixes
Fixed a script error caused by incomplete build generation.
Version 0.1.28: Layout & Hotkey Adjustments
Reinstated `Ctrl+Down` (Zoom In) and `Ctrl+Up` (Zoom Out) hotkeys in View Mode.
Moved the status bar to the bottom of the viewport, spanning the full width of the application.
Version 0.1.27: Focus & Stability Fixes
Fixed a critical ReferenceError in the standalone application build.
Improved focus restoration when switching from Edit to View mode.
Added keyboard shortcuts (Arrows, Enter) to View mode for smoother navigation.
Prevented focus stealing by fold/zoom icons.
Version 0.1.26: Focus Fixes
Fixed focus loss when switching from Edit to View mode.
Prevented fold and zoom icons from receiving keyboard focus.
Version 0.1.25: Standalone Update
Fixed 'searchQuery is not defined' error in standalone build.
Improved stability of component merging.
Consolidated all component code into a unified structure for easier distribution.
Version 0.1.24: Standalone Update
Optimized single-file structure for better performance and maintainability.
Fixed an issue where search queries were undefined, causing errors during navigation.
Consolidated all component code into a unified structure for easier distribution.
Version 0.1.23: Standalone Release
Bundled all application logic into a single self-contained HTML file for easy distribution.
Updated application version to 0.1.23.
Version 0.1.22: View & Edit Modes
Introduced distinct View and Edit modes for better navigation.
In View Mode, Arrow keys navigate the tree structure (Up/Down/Left/Right). Press Enter to edit.
In Edit Mode, Arrow keys function as a standard text editor. Press Esc to return to View Mode.
Updated application version to 0.1.22.
Version 0.1.21: UI Adjustments
Increased the text size in the status bar for better readability.
The sidebar is now collapsed by default when opening the application.
Updated application version to 0.1.21.
Version 0.1.20: Version Link
The version number in the status bar is now a link to the GitHub releases page.
Updated application version to 0.1.20.
Version 0.1.19: Sidebar Polish
Further reduced spacing for sidebar items for a denser view.
Updated sidebar headers to use a bold, regular font size.
Updated application version to 0.1.19.
Version 0.1.18: Refinements
Reduced padding for items in the Favorites and Recent sidebar lists for a more compact view.
Removed the logo image from the status bar.
Updated application version to 0.1.18.
Version 0.1.17: UI Refinements
Removed the logo from the status bar.
Reduced padding in the sidebar for favorites and recents, allowing more items to be visible.
Updated application version to 0.1.17.
Version 0.1.16: Sidebar Improvements
The sidebar is now resizable. Drag the right edge to adjust width.
Renamed 'Recently modified' to 'Recent' and made the section collapsible.
Version 0.1.15: Recently Modified Sidebar
Added a collapsible left sidebar that displays the 12 most recently modified items for quick navigation.
The sidebar state (open/closed) is now saved automatically.
Updated application version to 0.1.15.
Version 0.1.13: Visual & Branding Updates
Updated favicon to favicon.png and added logo.png to the status bar.
Updated application version to 0.1.13.
Version 0.1.12: Release Build Refactor
Refactored application into a standalone release build to improve portability and fix initialization issues.
Updated application version to 0.1.12.
Version 0.1.13: Stability Fixes
Fixed a startup error related to secure context requirements for ID generation.
Updated application version to 0.1.13.
Version 0.1.12: Backspace Merge
Pressing Backspace at the start of an item now merges it with the previous item's content.
Updated application version to 0.1.12.
Version 0.1.11: Performance & UX
Implemented lazy search indexing. The application no longer calculates searchable items on every keystroke, significantly improving typing performance in large outlines.
Replaced intrusive browser alerts with a non-blocking Toast notification system.
Updated application version to 0.1.11.
Version 0.1.10: Documentation Fixes
Corrected the JSON structure of the help documentation file to prevent import errors.
Updated application version to 0.1.10.
Version 0.1.9: Import Robustness
Fixed an issue where importing JSON files with missing properties could cause the application to crash.
Updated application version to 0.1.9.
Version 0.1.8: Hotkey Implementation
Enabled the `Ctrl+Shift+H` hotkey functionality.
Updated application version to 0.1.8.
Version 0.1.7: Home Hotkey
Added `Ctrl+Shift+H` to quickly navigate to the root of the outline and collapse all top-level items.
Updated application version to 0.1.7.
Version 0.1.4: Local Execution Fix
Fixed a significant loading issue that caused a blank screen when running the app directly from a downloaded file on a local computer. The application should now start correctly in this scenario.
Updated application version to 0.1.4.
Version 0.1.3: Critical Loading Fix
Fixed a critical bug that caused a blank screen when the application was launched, especially on Windows and ChromeOS. The app now loads reliably.
Updated application version to 0.1.3.
Version 0.1.2: Status Bar Enhancement
The text in the status bar now uses the main theme color, making it more vibrant and consistent with the UI.
Updated application version to 0.1.2.
Version 0.1.1: UI Polish & Versioning
Moved the outline title from the top toolbar to the bottom status bar for a cleaner look.
Updated application version to 0.1.1.
Version 0.1.0: Status Bar & Versioning
Added a status bar to the bottom of the application.
The status bar now displays the current app version, starting with v0.1.0.
Alpha: UI & Formatting Improvements
Renamed 'Recent Edits' and 'Recent Creations' tabs in Quick Find to 'Recently modified' and 'Recently created' for clarity.
Timestamps in Quick Find now include the time and are displayed for all search results.
All timestamps now use a 24-hour format.
Alpha: Timestamps & Enhanced Search
Bullets now track their creation and last modification dates.
The 'Quick Find' window (Ctrl+Shift+K) now has tabs to view bullets sorted by 'Recent Edits' and 'Recent Creations'.
Alpha: Advanced Search
Enhanced the 'Quick Find' modal to support multi-word and multi-tag searches.
By default, multiple terms are combined with AND logic (e.g., `#doc changelog` finds items with both).
You can use `OR` to find items matching any of the terms (e.g., `#doc OR changelog`).
Alpha: Further Optimization
Moved the changelog into the external `help-documentation.json` file.
Externalized all application CSS into a separate `index.css` file.
These changes make the main HTML file even smaller and faster to load.
Alpha: Major Simplification
Streamlined the application by removing all traces of the old sidebar functionality from the documentation.
Moved the extensive "Help & Documentation" content into a separate `help-documentation.json` file to reduce initial load size.
You can import the new JSON file at any time to access the full guide.
Alpha: Sync & UI Updates
Removed GitHub Sync functionality in favor of local indexedDB storage.
Alpha: Bug Fixes & Optimizations
Refactored internal bullet addition logic for better consistency.
Alpha: Code Refactoring & Cleanup
Removed unused color utility functions.
Upgraded object cloning to `structuredClone` for better performance.
Improved unique ID generation using `crypto.randomUUID`.
Optimized text rendering to reduce unnecessary recalculations.
